description: a(n) = E(n+1)-2E(n), where E(i) is the Euler number A000111(i).
comments: a(n) mod 10 for n>=2 is the periodic sequence repeat: 0, 1, 6, 9.For n >= 2 a(n) is the number of permutations on [n] that have n-2 "sequences" (which are maximal monotone runs in Comtet terminology) and start increasing. - _Michael Somos_, Aug 28 2013
